span.style: font-size:18; font-family:Comic Sans MS; font-weight:normal; font-style:normal; color:#550000
font-size:14; font-family:微软雅黑; font-weight:normal; font-style:normal; color:#000000

item.answer:
【考法 1】 vt. 加强，巩固…的底部： to support or strengthen from beneath
【例】 facts and statistics undergird his commentary 事实和数据支持了他的评论
【近】 strengthen, support, fortify, reinforce, bear, bolster, brace, buttress, carry, stay, sustain, underpin, uphold, prop up, shore up
【反】 undermine, weaken, debilitate, enfeeble, enervate 削弱

【记】 under + gird 束腰，横梁，下面加个横梁
